document_data.name: Lia
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lia''' was a [[tiefling]] resident of [[Elturel]] that became a refugee due to her peoples' exile following [[the Descent]] of the city during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|You and I will do some good here â€” I can feel it.}}
document_data.Personality: She was a compassionate person that strongly believed in cooperation for the greater good of her community.
document_data.History: Lia and her companion [[Cal]] followed the group of tieflings led by [[Zevlor]], that collectively traveled together from Elturel to the western city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. While the group was given shelter from [[goblin]] attacks at the [[Emerald Grove]], Lia and Cal believed they should stay and help the grove's [[druid]]s, while their friend [[Rolan]] was adamant about arriving in Baldur's Gate as soon as possible.
